content: bear eyeglass holder crochet pattern keep your glasses safe and cozy with this adorable bear eyeglass holder this charming crochet bear isn t just cute it s practical it s designed to hold your glasses securely while adding a touch of handmade warmth to your nightstand desk or craft space perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike this quick and satisfying project makes a great gift for glasses-wearers of all ages choose your favorite yarn colors to personalize your bear s look
